column4: is there anyway to check if I'm updated to Ibex? I've just done updates but there was no mention of a new distribution.
I had to go into the preferences and enable the update checker to check for new releases.  If it upgraded it should have taken quite a while to do it.
ok, thanks I'll poke around and see if I can find it (Not finding it where you said it was)
I see "Show new distribution releases: Long Term Support Releases Only" but I'm not getting informed via Updates Manager about the new release :(
